div.p: This page summarizes the main changes that have happened between releases of the implementation guide
This release includes minor, non-substantive corrections to the original 1.0.0 release.

ul.li: FHIR-42752 - Added missing this history page. (Original version was defined but not published or shown in the menu.)
FHIR-42746 - Corrected Feeling Scale value set to remove codes that were not supposed to be there.
FHIR-42749 - Corrected copy & paste issue with names in Activity-based measure table.

div.p: Initial official publication. Included the following key changes from the version that went to ballot, including the tracker item(s) that drove the changes.

ul.li: FHIR-41362 - Added Feeling Scale as an activity-based measure
FHIR-41295 - Reduced set of statuses allowed for Condition
FHIR-41294, FHIR-41292,FHIR-41291, FHIR-41290 - Tightened expectations on Goal, RelatedPerson, ServiceRequest, Task for Referral to increase interoperability
FHIR-41126, FHIR-41114, FHIR-41076, FHIR-41037, FHIR-40776 - Change observations to not use 'social history' as a category and fix cardinality around categories
FHIR-41053 - Corrected handling of SMS subscriptions
FHIR-40952 - Added 'mean' heart rate as an activity and time-based measure

FHIR-40796, FHIR-40767, FHIR-FHIR-40751 - Revamped CapabilityStatements, including deriving from appropriate US-Core statements, as well as revising what interactions are SHALL vs. SHOULD and adding support for resources such as Patient, Practitioner, etc.

div.p: There is a complete list of tracker items that drove changes in HL7's Jira repository.
Initial version of the implementation guide for ballot review.
